item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The Stallman Report (123 points | 126 comments)
2. Why make software? (18 points | 4 comments)
3. Boring Tech Is Stifling Improvement (33 points | 47 comments)
4. a protocol for reliable notifications over a 1 bit fallible connection (16 points | 5 comments)
5. New passkey specifications will let users import and export them (13 points | 14 comments)
6. Moving to LLVM IR (20 points | 5 comments)
7. RAGs to RIChes: chat with git projects (2 points | 1 comment)
8. LocalStorage vs. IndexedDB vs. Cookies vs. OPFS vs. WASM-SQLite (2 points | no comments)
9. Run Linux Containers on FreeBSD 14 with Podman (17 points | 1 comment)
10. OpenD on iPhone/Mac/etc.: ldc gets extern(Objective-C), dmd gets pragma(linkerDirective) and @section (16 points | 1 comment)
11. Large language models reduce public knowledge sharing on online Q&A platforms (37 points | 15 comments)
12. Graphics Tricks from Boomers (9 points | no comments)
13. Use an External GPU on Raspberry Pi 5 for 4K Gaming (10 points | no comments)
14. Antithesis: Pioneering Deterministic Hypervisors with FreeBSD and Bhyve (11 points | 2 comments)
15. vortex: A toolkit for working with compressed Arrow in-memory, on-disk, and over-the-wire. "The LLVM of file formats" (19 points | no comments)
16. The `Overwrite` trait and `Pin` (14 points | 1 comment)
17. Ward Christensen, BBS inventor and architect of our online age, dies at age 78 (13 points | 1 comment)
18. Minetest Rebranding to Luanti (27 points | 7 comments)
19. Build Systems, Not Heroes (1 points | no comments)
20. What are you doing this week? (21 points | 33 comments)
21. Object-Oriented Programming With ANSI-C (2 points | no comments)
22. Trust Rules Everything Around Me (WordPress, Code Security, etc.) (21 points | no comments)
23. Testing Without Mocks: A Pattern Language (1 points | no comments)
24. fjall: LSM-based embeddable key-value storage engine written in safe Rust (10 points | 2 comments)
25. Rabbit hole: stumbling across two Portuguese punched cards (1 points | no comments)
